data.quote: One best book is equal to a hundred good friends, but one good friend is equal to a library.
data.author: Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out..
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life--think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
data.author: Vaibhav Shah

data.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
data.author: Chris Grosser

data.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: If you're going through hell keep going.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
data.author: Bruce Feirstein

data.quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
data.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

data.quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
data.author: Steve Jobs
